articles.description: Without the large shadow cast by their captain, the attention was diffused across a big cast of characters | ESPN.in
articles.content: I can't pinpoint the exact moment. At a guess, it was somewhere between Ajinkya Rahane's century at the MCG and the almighty battering Hanuma Vihari and R Ashwin took at the SCG. As with the business… [+8335 chars]

articles.author: Reported by J Sam Daniel Stalin, Written by Santosh Rao
articles.title: Washington Sundar "Will Become A Legend", Says Father - NDTV Sports
articles.description: Washington Sundar's father, M Sundar, spoke exclusively to NDTV, and said his son's performance in Australia was "special" and backed him to "become a legend".
articles.content: Washington Sundar made his debut in the historic Gabba Test that India won to seal a 2-1 series win in Australia. Having called in after injuries ravaged Team India's playing XI, Washington Sundar be… [+2171 chars]
